# beget_softwares (Data Source)

List of available marketplace software distributions

## Map Structure
- Key: software slug (e.g., `ubuntu-24-04`)
- Value fields: `id`, `slug`, `name`, `display_name`, `version`, `description`

## Filtering
Use Terraform expressions to select a subset of images:

- `keys(data.beget_softwares.all.softwares)` collects all slugs
- `for` + `if startswith(slug, "ubuntu-")` keeps only Ubuntu images

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Fetch entire marketplace catalog
data "beget_softwares" "all" {}

# List all software slugs
output "software_slugs" {
  value = keys(data.beget_softwares.all.softwares)
}
```
```terraform
# Filter catalog to only Ubuntu images
data "beget_softwares" "filtered" {}

locals {
  ubuntu_images = {
    for slug, sw in data.beget_softwares.filtered.softwares : slug => sw
    if startswith(slug, "ubuntu-")
  }
}

output "ubuntu_images" {
  value = {
    count = length(local.ubuntu_images)
    ids   = [for v in local.ubuntu_images : v.id]
  }
}
```
```terraform
# Fetch catalog to read specific image details
data "beget_softwares" "ubuntu" {}

locals {
  ubuntu_lts = data.beget_softwares.ubuntu.softwares["ubuntu-24-04"]
}

output "ubuntu_lts" {
  value = {
    id           = local.ubuntu_lts.id
    slug         = local.ubuntu_lts.slug
    display_name = local.ubuntu_lts.display_name
    version      = local.ubuntu_lts.version
    description  = local.ubuntu_lts.description
  }
}
```
